Game.Name: F-1 Sensation (Japan)
Game.plot: F-1 Sensation is a Driving game, developed and published by Konami,which was released in Japan in 1993.Cheat: Add Lap TimeDuring a race, pause the game, then hold B and Select. After, pressing A will increase the "lap timeout" variable: it is one invisible to the player; however, increasing it will allow you to stay on a race as long as you need without automatic retirement. (Note: Incrementing the timeout too high will cause an automatic timeout.)Cheat: Various Passwords...Enter the following passwords at the CONTINUE screen. be sure to enter your name as "AETHER-K" or the passwords won't work...
